title: The Secret Files of J. Edgar Hoover
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/United States. Federal Bureau of Investigation
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Internal security - United States
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Hoover, J. Edgar (John Edgar), 1895-1972
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/United States - Politics and government
description: All personalities whose actions shaped 20th century America, and all unwitting stars in an infamous production are now revealed for the very first time in "The secret files of J. Edgar Hoover". Power, fear, influence - serving under 8 presidents, he was accountable to none. Politicians came and went, but Hoover remained, a public servant who died a millionaire.
